offerings.name: Escape! Cake
offerings.description:
Grants +100 % bonus Bloodpoints in all Scoring Categories.
The bonus Bloodpoints are applied after exiting the Trial.
"This picture of a cake sure is real."

offerings.name: Bloody Party Streamers
offerings.description:
Grants +100 % bonus Bloodpoints in all Scoring Categories to all Players.
The bonus Bloodpoints are applied after exiting the Trial.
"A reminder of a bloody good time when people came together, but left screaming."

offerings.name: Chalk Pouch
offerings.description:
Unlocks the ability to attempt Self-Unhooks during the first Hook Stage:
Increases your personal Luck at succeeding them by +1 %.
"A small cotton pouch filled with white chalky powder of unknown origin.
Some believe it brings good fortune."

offerings.name: Cream Chalk Pouch
offerings.description:
Unlocks the ability to attempt Self-Unhooks during the first Hook Stage:
Increases your personal Luck at succeeding them by +2 %.
"A small cotton pouch half-filled with a cream coloured chalky powder of unknown origin.
Releases a faint herbal aroma. Some believe it brings good fortune."

offerings.name: Ivory Chalk Pouch
offerings.description:
Unlocks the ability to attempt Self-Unhooks during the first Hook Stage:
Increases your personal Luck at succeeding them by +3 %.
"A small leather pouch displaying a straight white line hand-sewn on one of its sides.
The bag is filled with an ivory chalky powder that shines under the moonlight.
Some believe it brings good fortune."

offerings.name: Bloodied Blueprint
offerings.description:
Grants the following effects at the start of the Trial:
Increases the likelihood of the Basement spawning in the Killer Shack by +100 %, if it is available.
The Auras of the Basement Hooks are revealed to you for 20 seconds.
"Spatters of dried blood partially conceal the design."

offerings.name: Torn Blueprint
offerings.description:
Grants the following effects at the start of the Trial:
Increases the likelihood of the Basement spawning in the Landmark Building by +100 %, if it is available.
The Auras of the Basement Hooks are revealed to you for 20 seconds.
"Though brittle and torn, the design is mostly legible."

offerings.name: Tarnished Coin
offerings.description:
Calls upon The Entity for the following effect:
Increases the number of Chests in the environment by +1.
"A round piece of metal which has lost all sheen."

offerings.name: Shiny Coin
offerings.description:
Calls upon The Entity for the following effect:
Increases the number of Chests in the environment by +2.
"A clean and polished piece of gold."

offerings.name: Clear Reagent
offerings.description:
Calls upon The Entity for the following effect:
Reduces the thickness of the Dark Mist by -50 %.
"The Mist rolls in, traps all in its deep madness.
There is no running, no escape, no asylum, except for the clear waters of the pond lost in the forest." — Unknown, Notebook

offerings.name: Faint Reagent
offerings.description:
Calls upon The Entity for the following effect:
Increases the thickness of the Dark Mist by +25 %.
"Paralysed, I stand in the cold as death lingers."

offerings.name: Hazy Reagent
offerings.description:
Calls upon The Entity for the following effect:
Increases the thickness of the Dark Mist by +50 %.
"The Mist is alluring, hypnotising.
I love it and fear it at the same time." — Donna's Sketchbook

offerings.name: Murky Reagent
offerings.description:
Calls upon The Entity for the following effect:
Increases the thickness of the Dark Mist by +75 %.
"The Mist seems to protect us from the beast, but it is a poison, a cancer, filling us with darkness and insanity." — Unknown, Notebook

offerings.name: Annotated Blueprint
offerings.description:
Grants the following effect at the start of the Trial:
Increases the likelihood of the Hatch spawning by the Killer Shack by +100 %, if it is available.
"Essential information is scribbled along the side, but by whom?"

offerings.name: Vigo's Blueprint
offerings.description:
Grants the following effect at the start of the Trial:
Increases the likelihood of the Hatch spawning by the Landmark Building by +100 %, if it is available.
"A clever design that has the letter 'V' etched on the bottom."

offerings.name: Mouldy Oak
offerings.description:
Calls upon The Entity for the following effect:
Reduces the minimum distance between Spawn locations for Hooks by -1.5 metres.
"A damp and decaying piece of oak replete with mould."

offerings.name: Rotten Oak
offerings.description:
Calls upon The Entity for the following effect:
Reduces the minimum distance between Spawn locations for Hooks by -2.5 metres.
"A decomposing piece of oak in which strange markings have been etched."

offerings.name: Petrified Oak
offerings.description:
Calls upon The Entity for the following effect:
Increases the minimum distance between Spawn locations for Hooks by +1 metre.
"A deteriorating piece of petrified wood."

offerings.name: Putrid Oak
offerings.description:
Calls upon The Entity for the following effect:
Reduces the minimum distance between Spawn locations for Hooks by -3.5 metres.
"A ruined piece of oak oozing with a black putrescent liquid."

offerings.name: Azarov's Key
offerings.description:
Calls upon The Entity for the following effect:
Increases the chances to be sent to a Map in the Autohaven Wreckers Realm to 20 %.
"A broken key pertaining to a vehicle of unknown brand.
A key-chain attached to it identifies the owner as a certain 'A. Azarov'"

offerings.name: Grandma's Cookbook
offerings.description:
Calls upon The Entity for the following effect:
Increases the chances to be sent to a Map in the Backwater Swamp Realm to 20 %.
"A leather-bound book containing horrible human meat recipes such as the granny-slapping good chilli."

offerings.name: Heart Locket
offerings.description:
Calls upon The Entity for the following effect:
Increases the chances to be sent to a Map in the Coldwind Farm Realm to 20 %.
"A silver heart locket necklace.
The simple interior is engraved with the following: 'E+M'."

offerings.name: Charred Wedding Photograph
offerings.description:
Calls upon The Entity for the following effect:
Increases the chances to be sent to a Map in the Crotus Prenn Asylum Realm to 20 %.
"A burned portrait of a couple on their wedding day, the faces are completely charred and unidentifiable."

offerings.name: Beef Tallow Mixture
offerings.description:
Calls upon The Entity for the following effect:
Increases the chances to be sent to a Map in the The Decimated Borgo Realm to 20 %.
"The stink of rotting organic matter emanates from this foul mixture, designed with the grim intent to create a fire that burns very hot and very long."

offerings.name: Airlock Doors
offerings.description:
Calls upon The Entity for the following effect:
Increases the chances to be sent to the Nostromo Wreckage Map in the Dvarka Deepwood Realm to 20 %.
"You know the quarantine procedure.
24 hours for decontamination." — Ellen Ripley

offerings.name: Alien Flora
offerings.description:
Calls upon The Entity for the following effect:
Increases the chances to be sent to the Toba Landing Map in the Dvarka Deepwood Realm to 20 %.
"Our arrival will change the face of this planet as we know it." — Sarah, Science Officer

offerings.name: Crow's Eye
offerings.description:
Calls upon The Entity for the following effect:
Increases the chances to be sent to a Map in the Forsaken Boneyard Realm to 20 %.
"The dark, beady eye shifts back and forth as if searching for a bloody strip of carrion."

offerings.name: Jigsaw Piece
offerings.description:
Calls upon The Entity for the following effect:
Increases the chances to be sent to a Map in the Gideon Meat Plant Realm to 20 %.
"Congratulations.
You are still alive.
Most people are so ungrateful to be alive.
But not you.
Not anymore."

offerings.name: Shattered Bottle
offerings.description:
Calls upon The Entity for the following effect:
Increases the chances to be sent to a Map in the Grave of Glenvale Realm to 20 %.
"Ain't much for holding a drink no more, but it can sure make a mess of a fella's throat."

offerings.name: Strode Realty Key
offerings.description:
Calls upon The Entity for the following effect:
Increases the chances to be sent to a Map in the Haddonfield Realm to 20 %.
"A house key, mundane in appearance.
A cardboard key-tag attached to it reads 'Strode Real Estate', followed by a handwritten address:
'45 Lampkin Lane'."

offerings.name: Hawkins National Laboratory ID
offerings.description:
Calls upon The Entity for the following effect:
Increases the chances to be sent to a Map in the Hawkins National Laboratory Realm to 20 %.
"A soggy, bloodstained identification card with a serial number."

offerings.name: Shattered Glasses
offerings.description:
Calls upon The Entity for the following effect:
Increases the chances to be sent to a Map in the Léry's Memorial Institute Realm to 20 %.
"Bent reading glasses.
Speckles of dried blood can be seen on the shattered lenses."

offerings.name: MacMillan's Phalanx Bone
offerings.description:
Calls upon The Entity for the following effect:
Increases the chances to be sent to a Map in the The MacMillan Estate Realm to 20 %.
"MacMillan's skeletal remains were found in the basement of the mine's storehouse.
His leg bones shattered into pieces and a mining hammer lying in his lap."

offerings.name: Damaged Photo
offerings.description:
28 August 1996
Calls upon The Entity for the following effect:
Increases the chances to be sent to a Map in the Ormond Realm to 20 %.
"A dormant darkness lies beneath his childlike smile, about to be awakened."

offerings.name: RPD Badge
offerings.description:
Calls upon The Entity for the following effect:
Increases the chances to be sent to a Map in the Raccoon City Realm to 20 %.
"If we stay here that monster will find us."

offerings.name: The Last Mask
offerings.description:
Calls upon The Entity for the following effect:
Increases the chances to be sent to a Map in the Red Forest Realm to 20 %.
"A beautifully crafted tiger mask that would fit snug on a child's face.
A faded note in the Cyrillic alphabet can be found scripted on the back."

offerings.name: Mary's Letter
offerings.description:
Calls upon The Entity for the following effect:
Increases the chances to be sent to a Map in the Silent Hill Realm.
This Offering modifies the Realm Selector Logic by a value of 20 %.
"In my restless dreams, I see that town."

offerings.name: The Pied Piper
offerings.description:
Calls upon The Entity for the following effect:
Increases the chances to be sent to a Map in the Springwood Realm.
This Offering modifies the Realm Selector Logic by a value of 20 %.
"Betrayed by the town, he exacts his revenge by taking all their children."

offerings.name: Ichorous Loam
offerings.description:
Calls upon The Entity for the following effect:
Increases the chances to be sent to a Map in the Withered Isle Realm to 20 %.
"Expel malthought from your mind, from your heart, from your mouth, to prevent the darkness from corrupting your truth.
For to let darkness find seed in your soul is to invite The Druanee."

offerings.name: Yamaoka Family Crest
offerings.description:
Calls upon The Entity for the following effect:
Increases the chances to be sent to a Map in the Yamaoka Estate Realm to 20 %.
"You never leave a broken home.
You only run away until the memories stop haunting you."

offerings.name: Shroud of Union
offerings.description:
Calls upon The Entity for the following effect:
You start the Trial together with someone else.
"A knotted piece of fabric."

offerings.name: Vigo's Shroud
offerings.description:
Calls upon The Entity for the following effect:
Causes you to spawn as far away from the Killer as possible.
"I found marvels through the years in The Fog, but only now do I understand how to bend The Fog's irrefragable rules." — Vigo's Journal

offerings.name: Sacrificial Ward
offerings.description:
Calls upon The Entity for the following effect:
Causes all Realm or Map Selection Offerings burnt by other Players to be rejected.
Sacrificial Ward is trumped only when all other Players burn the identical Realm or Map Selection Offering.
"With blind eyes, we surrender our will and appeal to you for guidance."

offerings.name: Black Ward
offerings.description:
Calls upon The Entity for the following effect:
Causes your Add-ons to not be consumed after ending the Trial.
"Hear my voice, spare my ways, protect me from the void."

offerings.name: White Ward
offerings.description:
Calls upon The Entity for the following effect:
Causes your held Item to be protected from loss upon death.
Causes any attached Add-ons to not be consumed upon death or escaping the Trial.
"Keep me from evil, defend me, and pass away."

offerings.name: Any offering
offerings.description: Pick any offering of your choosing

offerings.name: No offering
offerings.description: Nothing
